page.title: 08A FERNESS HOUSEHOLD
page.content: One Ferness family has 2 adults and 3 children from 4_9yrs.When 2 children have left for school, the parents have a very busy day. eg:- morning tasks _ milking and feeding goats, housework, making beds, some washing. afternoon _ gardening, collect children from school car, baking, preparing meal, craftwork. evening _ wash up , supervising children's homework, putting children to bed, ironing. The family shops once a week mostly to Nairn (11 miles distant) for groceries, and when clothes are required, a longer journey of around 23 miles takes them to Inverness. A car is a necessity as shops are so far away.
